TopicTitle: On the upcoming/design-complete redesign of the Mk series parts, especially Mk3 parts

Articles.Content: Will there be a complete rethinking of the Mk3 parts? Right now they can't fit any 2.5 meter parts in them and the 1.25 meter parts can. Will the Mk3 parts be a totally new shape? It's a well known assertion that the Mk3 parts are useless, but are the only parts you can build a shuttle from. Will this be changed? Will ModuleJointMotorTest give us gimballed shuttle engines?
I hope so. looking forward to detailed descriptions in the tuesday devnotes.
